serverError: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.
internalServerError: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.
routeNotFound: The requested endpoint does not exist.
badRequest: The request is invalid. Please check the request payload and parameters.
validationError: Request validation failed. One or more fields contain invalid values.
unauthorized: Authentication failed. Invalid or missing credentials.
forbidden: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
notFound: The requested resource could not be found.
conflict: Request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current resource state.
tooManyRequests: Rate limit exceeded. Please retry after a few minutes.
noResponseFromServer: No response received from the server. Please check your connection and try again.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.
requestFailed: The request failed with an HTTP error status.
invalidTokenOrWrongConfiguration: Authentication failed due to invalid token or incorrect configuration.
tokenExpired: Authentication token has expired. Please refresh the token and try again.
unknownAuthenticationError: Authentication failed due to an unknown error. Please retry.
propertyLimitExceeded: Property limit exceeded. Upgrade subscription or renew plan to add more properties.
projectLimitExceeded: Project limit exceeded. Upgrade subscription or renew plan to add more projects.
featuredPropertyLimitExceeded: Featured property limit exceeded. Upgrade subscription to feature more properties.
highlightedProjectLimitExceeded: Highlighted project limit exceeded. Upgrade subscription to highlight more projects.
userIsNotVerified: User account is not verified. Verification is required before proceeding.
